verses.verse: O give thanks <WH3034> unto the Lord <WH3068>; for he is good <WH2896>: for his mercy <WH2617> endures for ever <WH5769>.
O give thanks <WH3034> unto the God <WH430> of gods <WH430>: for his mercy <WH2617> endures for ever <WH5769>.
O give thanks <WH3034> to the Lord <WH113> of lords <WH113>: for his mercy <WH2617> endures for ever <WH5769>.
To him who alone does <WH6213> great <WH1419> wonders <WH6381>: for his mercy <WH2617> endures for ever <WH5769>.
To him that by wisdom <WH8394> made <WH6213> the heavens <WH8064>: for his mercy <WH2617> endures for ever <WH5769>.
To him that stretched out <WH7554> the earth <WH776> above the waters <WH4325>: for his mercy <WH2617> endures for ever <WH5769>.
To him that made <WH6213> great <WH1419> lights <WH216>: for his mercy <WH2617> endures for ever <WH5769>:
The sun <WH8121> to rule <WH4475> by day <WH3117>: for his mercy <WH2617> endures for ever <WH5769>:
The moon <WH3394> and stars <WH3556> to rule <WH4475> by night <WH3915>: for his mercy <WH2617> endures for ever <WH5769>.
To him that struck <WH5221> Egypt <WH4714> in their firstborn <WH1060>: for his mercy <WH2617> endures for ever <WH5769>:
And brought out <WH3318> Israel <WH3478> from among <WH8432> them <WH2617>: for his mercy endures for ever <WH5769>:
With a strong <WH2389> hand <WH3027>, and with a stretched out <WH5186> arm <WH2220>: for his mercy <WH2617> endures for ever <WH5769>.
To him which divided <WH1504> the Red <WH5488> sea <WH3220> into parts <WH1506>: for his mercy <WH2617> endures for ever <WH5769>:
And made Israel <WH3478> to pass through <WH5674> the middle <WH8432> of it <WH2617>: for his mercy endures for ever <WH5769>:
But overthrew <WH5287> Pharaoh <WH6547> and his army <WH2428> in the Red <WH5488> sea <WH3220>: for his mercy <WH2617> endures for ever <WH5769>.
To him which led <WH3212> his people <WH5971> through the wilderness <WH4057>: for his mercy <WH2617> endures for ever <WH5769>.
To him which struck <WH5221> great <WH1419> kings <WH4428>: for his mercy <WH2617> endures for ever <WH5769>:
And killed <WH2026> famous <WH117> kings <WH4428>: for his mercy <WH2617> endures for ever <WH5769>:
Sihon <WH5511> king <WH4428> of the Amorites <WH567>: for his mercy <WH2617> endures for ever <WH5769>:
And Og <WH5747> the king <WH4428> of Bashan <WH1316>: for his mercy <WH2617> endures for ever <WH5769>:
And gave <WH5414> their land <WH776> for a heritage <WH5159>: for his mercy <WH2617> endures for ever <WH5769>:
Even a heritage <WH5159> unto Israel <WH3478> his servant <WH5650>: for his mercy <WH2617> endures for ever <WH5769>.
Who remembered <WH2142> us in our low estate <WH8216>: for his mercy <WH2617> endures for ever <WH5769>:
And has redeemed <WH6561> us from our enemies <WH6862>: for his mercy <WH2617> endures for ever <WH5769>.
Who gives <WH5414> food <WH3899> to all flesh <WH1320>: for his mercy <WH2617> endures for ever <WH5769>.
O give thanks <WH3034> unto the God <WH410> of heaven <WH8064>: for his mercy <WH2617> endures for ever <WH5769>.
